channel.title: Photography on Kamil Pro
channel.description: Recent content in Photography on Kamil Pro

item.title: It happened â€“ I ordered my first DSLR.
item.description: When I look backwards, I have always been fascinated by a photography for quite a long time. But it really hit me about 4 years ago, when I bought some Panasonic camera with 16x zoom. It was only at that particular time that I thought zoom was the most important feature of a camera. Well, I can now say that it is cool to have zoom, but without vibration reduction you cannot do much on long focal length.
